entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 9:54 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of freezing rain changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers except snow over higher terrain overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
